about_the_game:
You play as a nameless hero on a futuristic playing field in a wacky TV game show called “Cybergrid - The Show” competing for prestige, fame, honor, and ultimately wealth!

Your goal in this show is to demonstrate your skills in combat against an ever-increasing number of opponents and ensure your survival.

Along the way, you’ll encounter many crazy enemies and bosses who are also fighting for this spot in the TV show.

But you have a unique ability that sets you apart from everyone else.

You have the “Beatstomp”!

Prove your skills and sense of rhythm, use your Beatstomp in time with the music, increase your combos, your damage dealt, and your hype.

This, in turn, increases your fame and credits, which unlocks more incredible abilities in the game.

The more accurately you “Stomp” to the beat of the music, the higher your damage and the greater your fame, honor, and credits at the end!

Show the world who the best is. Show the world who YOU are!

Show the world that you have what it takes to survive this crazy TV show and break the ultimate high score!

Claim the title of “Beat Survivor”!

Visit the Upgrade Shop after each successful round to enhance your stats and prepare for the ever-growing waves of stronger and more numerous enemies.

The better you play, the more GridCreds you collect at the end of the round.

Use this currency to purchase upgrades for your physical abilities, increase the damage of your weapon and Beatstomp to insane levels—enough to make your opponents tremble in fear!

But choose your upgrades wisely and strategically, as you never know which options will be available in the next round.

"Does it make sense to spend all my GridCreds, or should I save them?"

The choice is yours—because maybe, on your next visit to the shop, the ultimate legendary upgrade awaits, making you unstoppable!
